messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Newbie, too! Long, too!
messages.msgSnippet: ... No rain here in Utah, even at the higher elevations. We do get LOTS of snow, but it s still pretty hot in the summer. There s a bit more rainy days in CO,
messages.messageBody:
>>You get snow?
>
>I was thinking she'd like northern Colorado or Utah, at a highish
>elevation.>>

No rain here in Utah, even at the higher elevations. We do get LOTS of snow,
but it's still pretty hot in the summer. There's a bit more rainy days in
CO, but nothing at all like England. How about OR near the mountains? Plenty
of rain there, but you can get to the snow if you need to. ;-)

Life is good.
~Mary
